mapper.select: select * from Freeboard order by REGEXP_REPLACE(FREEBOARD_CD, '[0-9]') , to_number(REGEXP_REPLACE(FREEBOARD_CD, '[^0-9]')) desc

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (SELECT * FROM freeboard ORDER BY REGEXP_REPLACE(freeboard_CD, '[0-9]') , TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(freeboard_CD, '[^0-9]')) DESC) A ) B WHERE B.RN >= (#{page} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND B.RN <= #{page} * #{pageSize}

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (SELECT * FROM freeboard where fb_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or member_id LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY REGEXP_REPLACE(freeboard_CD, '[0-9]') , TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(freeboard_CD, '[^0-9]')) DESC) A ) B WHERE B.RN >= (#{page} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND B.RN <= #{page} * #{pageSize}
